 2018-08302018-06-21,  ,  ,  ,  PSPC
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisAppointment of JESSICA LEE MCDONALD of Vancouver, British Columbia, to be the interim President and Chief Executive Officer of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure, until such time as a new President and Chief Executive Officer is in place.
